views.markdown:
Supports iOS 8.0 to 10.2






remodels your SpringBoard into a real 3D enviroment!

for your SpringBoard has come to make jailbreaking fun again!


This first-time-ever tweak uses Apple's SceneKit framework to createremodelled from your existing icons!

follow the device's movement and turn in the direction the device is pointing to!

like,simulation,, make scrolling to the next page as fun as never before!


(Rotate, Morph, Solar System, Motion Blur and many more to come!)







for your icons






with most SpringBoard tweaks, including and not limited to WinterBoard, Anemone, Barrel, Springtomize, Apex, Five Icon Dock, SBRotator and many more.

- Supported devices are from iPhone 4S and higher, iPad 2 and higher, iPod Gen 3 and higher. iOS from 8.0 to 10.2.

- Fixed an issue with Anchor crashing after changing position of an icon and then rotating.
- Added support for Stealth Folder
- Added support for Harbor
- Increased cube maximum chamfer radius to match a sphere.


- Fixed a crash on iOS 8.x when changing shapes
- Fixed opening folders showing actual folder icon on iOS 8-9 
- Fixed libactivator icon appearing black when inside folders
- Additional UI Fixes


- Adds support for blank icons
- Adds support for coloured badges
- Adds support for CirDock
- Adds motion blur intensity adjustment
- Adds motion blur inside folders 
- Fixes some UI issues


- Fixed a crash issue on iOS 9.0.x
- Fixed badges not being hidden based on notification settings
- Minor UI fixes
